title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 197.10 - Interview of workers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 197.10 - Interview of workers

State Regulations

The commissioner or his duly authorized representative may
interview farm or food processing workers at any reasonable time and at any
location where work is being performed, or will be performed, or where a farm
labor camp or farm labor camp commissary is maintained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
197.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
